item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Masataka Kashiwagi. Now, I’m working as Machine Learning Engineer at Connehito, Inc. I am involved in data analysis of improvement activities and using machine learning for own services. Development of Machine Learning Systems for service growth. Utilizing internal data to grow services. Utilize machine learning to create a better user experience. I’m interested in multimodal learning and in consumer behavior model in life events. Summary I obtained a master’s degree in physics. My research is to reveal novel superconductivity phenomena using numerical calculations. After graduate school, I got a job with a major telecommunications carrier. I was working as Solution Engineer which was familiar with marketing automation tools in Digital Marketing.

item.title: Excel Binary WorkbookをPythonで処理
item.description: はじめに 今回は，先日初めて見たファイル形式のExcel Binary Workbook (xlsb)に関して，pythonでcsvにパースする話です． .xlsxはよくあるExcelファイルの形式ですが，それのバイナリー形式である.
